text: [[col:red]]MCT settings have not been finalized! Select settings and press "Finalize Settings"![[/col]]
[[col:red]]MCT settings have been changed by the Host! Open the panel to check changed settings.[[/col]]
[[col:red]]This setting can only be edited in the frontend menu![[/col]]
[[col:red]]This setting can only be edited by the MP host![[/col]]
[[col:red]]This setting cannot be edited during battle![[/col]]
Press the check to open MCT. Or, press the x to accept all default values for the new settings.

Loading the Host's settings from MCT. Make sure you're cool with the settings they've picked. Do note - you can't see the host's settings until you load into the campaign, so you'll have to discuss it elsewhere.
Press the check mark to open up the MCT panel. Press the x to set to the default values for the new options.
Change all the settings for the currently selected mod back to the modder-specified defaults.
Save and apply all changed settings. There will be a pop-up to confirm your changes.
Delete Profile||Delete the currently selected MCT Profile. Irreversible!
The following mods have new options created since loading up this session (either due to a lord choice, or something happening in the game, etc):
New settings have been added since the last time you've played, in mods
Loading your settings from MCT. Make sure the other player is cool with the settings you've chosen, if you care!
[[col:fabulous_pink]]IF THIS IS WRONG - IF THE OTHER PLAYER IS ON THE LEFT SIDE OF THE SCREEN - PLEASE LOAD TO THE MAIN MENU AND LOAD BACK IN.[[/col]]
[[col:fabulous_pink]]IF THIS IS WRONG - IF YOU ARE ON THE LEFT SIDE OF THE SCREEN - PLEASE LOAD TO THE MAIN MENU AND LOAD BACK IN. ALSO REPORT THIS TO VANDY.[[/col]]
Type in your desired profile name and description below.
\\n[[col:red]]Invalid key - a profile with that name already exists![[/col]]
\\n[[col:red]]Invalid key - you have to insert a string![[/col]]
Edit Profile||Edit the selected profile, to rename it or change its description.
Create Profile||Add a new Profile, with all the same settings as the currently selected Profile to start.
Are you sure you would like to delete your Profile with the key [%s]? This action is irreversible!
Are you sure you want to change profiles? There are pending changes on [%s] that will be lost if you continue.
